bibl.title: Water, Toponymy, and the Image of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Tries to analyze how urban toponyms and urban water infrastructures are related to the perception of the city in Graeco-Roman Egypt.

bibl.title: The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality.

bibl.seg: Carruesco Jesús, Water, Toponymy, and the Image of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Avec résumé en anglais.
Eva Subías, Pedro Azara, Jesús Carruesco, Ignacio Fiz and Rosa Cuesta (Edd.), The Space of the City in Graeco-Roman Egypt. Image and Reality = Documenta. 22 (Tarragona, 2011) pp. 33-39; - 219.
Tries to analyze how urban toponyms and urban water infrastructures are related to the perception of the city in Graeco-Roman Egypt.
